author: stevel
msg: tab to space rework, and other minor touches

author: stevel
msg: I'm not sure I fully understand the function of the enabled tag, because it not a simple 'use this filter' if enabled=true thing, the enabled flag becomes part of the argument to jprobe. Someone who knows the task will need to correct the docs.

As an aside, ant:tdg does list this flag, so they did look at the code in places after all, just never bothered to file a bugrep when they found something missing. Sigh. They just never looked at EchoTask :)

author: stevel
msg: maybe we should factor out the stuff in setproxy, add a helper to set proxy params on any HttpUrlConnection and then this task, get and setproxy can share it
